name: remover
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a substance that removes something: Do you have any nail polish remover? stain remover (furniture) remover UK (US (furniture) mover)
a person or company who helps people to move their furniture and other possessions when they move to a new home: I've just been watching the furniture removers come and go in the street.

PROPERTY
  UK (US mover) a person or company that transports furniture, etc. when people move to a new home, or a business moves to new offices: a furniture remover The office move was done by a local firm of removers.
a substance, tool, or system that removes something that is not wanted: a stain remover Any decent spyware remover should be able to detect and remove most of these common adware applications.
